referenceObject.reference: Rix, M. G., Wilson, J. D. & Harvey, M. S. (2019). A revision of the white-headed spiny trapdoor spiders of the genus Euoplos (Mygalomorphae: Idiopidae: Arbanitinae): a remarkable lineage of rare mygalomorph spiders from the south-western Australian biodiversity hotspot. Journal of Arachnology 47(1): 63-76.
